title: Effect of unemployed workers becoming discouraged

content.question: If unemployed workers become discouraged and give up trying to find work, the number of workers employed and the unemployment rate would change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Number of Workers Employed Unemployment Rate Decrease Decrease
Number of Workers Employed Unemployment Rate Decrease Increase
Number of Workers Employed Unemployment Rate Decrease No change
Number of Workers Employed Unemployment Rate No change Decrease
Number of Workers Employed Unemployment Rate No change Increase

content.answer: Number of Workers Employed Unemployment Rate No change Decrease

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle
